text: Jawab mein unke Rubb ne farmaya, “ mai tum mein se kisi ka amal zaya karne wala nahin hoon, khwa mard ho ya aurat, tum sab ek dusre ke hum jins ho. Lihaza jin logon ne meri khatir apne watan chodey aur jo meri raah mein apne gharon se nikale gaye aur sataye gaye aur mere liye ladey aur maarey gaye unke sab kasoor mai maaf kardunga aur unhein aisey baaghon mein daakhil karunga jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi. Yeh unki jaza hai Allah ke haan aur behtareen jaza Allah hi ke paas hai”
